title: wow, eve, and delicious
html: Come see me try to write big words on my new blog about what I hope is not a new MMORPG addiction, while I work through the aftermath of this thing having been hacked.
body: Come see me try to write big words on my new blog about what I hope is not a new MMORPG addiction, while I work through the aftermath of this thing having been hacked.

title: cheating on my "real" blog
html: decafbad recaffeinated is what I'm so far calling the Tinderbox-built blog with which I'm cheating on both my OPML blog and my "real" blog. Come take a look, if you're so inclined to watch another of my experiments. (Update: It's recaffeinated, not recaffinated. I ar gud speler.)
body: decafbad recaffeinated is what I'm so far calling the Tinderbox-built blog with which I'm cheating on both my OPML blog and my "real" blog. Come take a look, if you're so inclined to watch another of my experiments. (*Update*: It's recaffeinated, not recaffinated. I ar gud speler.)
